title: 8-Bit Hordes Gameplay - MY FIRST LOOK!
description:
8-Bit Hordes Gameplay - 8-Bit Hordes is a follow up game to 8-Bit Armies.  It is a fast pace easy to learn real time strategy Arcade game.  This is my first look at the game!  Hope you Enjoy :D

NOTE: This is the Beta Version of the Game, not the Final Product.

The game releases on August 12th 2016.  

Steam Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/497850/

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
